Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a tying home run in the ninth inning
Mookie Betts followed with a game-ending drive as the Los Angeles Dodgers rallied for a 6-5 victory over the Colorado Rockies
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers maintained their three-game lead in the National League West division
The game was played at Dodger Stadium in front of 50,730 fans
